name: vuepress-theme-single-page-sections
description: A VuePress theme that extends the default theme by sections to create single page layouts with several sections combined on one page
author: Peter Tandler (https://github.com/ptandler)

scripts.docs:serve-build: mkdir -pv ./tmp/ && cd ./tmp && rm -f vuepress-theme-single-page-sections && ln -s ../docs vuepress-theme-single-page-sections && echo open http://localhost:5000/vuepress-theme-single-page-sections && serve
scripts.publish-minor:dev: git push && git checkout master && git merge dev && yarn publish --minor && git push && git checkout dev && git merge master
scripts.publish-patch:dev: git push && git checkout master && git merge dev && yarn publish --patch && git push && git checkout dev && git merge master
scripts.release-minor:dev: git push && git checkout master && git merge dev && yarn version --minor && git push && git checkout dev && git merge master
scripts.release-patch:dev: git push && git checkout master && git merge dev && yarn version --patch && git push && git checkout dev && git merge master
